page.title: 05INDUSTRY FOR FOOD PACKAGING.
page.content: B Paks is situated in Bury because they are a local company, there is plenty of labour available and it is also an agricultural area. All men and women are local and are not asked for qualifications. The workers wear overalls and work eight hours per day. They operate machinery to pack the produce.They pack and sell agricultural produce and exotic fruits and vegetables.The foods are imported from France,Spain,Holland and Israel. They are distributed to the supermarkets,Tesco,Finefare and Sainsburys all over the country.B Paks opens to the public so they can buy the produce.They have a social club for employees and their friends.
